title: [K-12] Advancements and Applications of Cognitive Load Theory: Deep Learning Through Integration and Validation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational psychology theories, educational principles, and basic concepts of cognitive science
context.additional_context: The need to cultivate theory-based design capabilities to strengthen corporate language education programs. Integrating practical and theoretical learning in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the core principles of cognitive load theory (intrinsic, extraneous, and germane load) to language learning design.
Learners can explain the impact of theory integration on instructional design by analyzing experimental verification results.
Learners can systematically organize the process of theory development through replication failure cases and propose improvement strategies.

resources: PDF Casebook on Cognitive Load Theory
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
